it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core

Interface Point

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LinkEntity, Owned
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    InnerName, InnerName, Point, Port<C>, Port

    public interface Point
extends LinkEntity
    Points are link entities connected by the hyper-edges composing the link graphs. Points are inner names or ports depending on whereas they belong to an inner interface or to a node.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Handle getHandle()
      Get the current handler (outername or edge) of a point.
